org.akhikhl.unpuzzle.utils
[Groovy] Class ArchiveUnpacker

java.lang.Object
  org.akhikhl.unpuzzle.utils.ArchiveUnpacker

final class ArchiveUnpacker

Unpacks the specified archive file - .zip, .tar.gz, .gz or .tar As a convenience feature prints the number of unpacked bytes to console.

Authors:
akhikhl
